query.Avail Leave: Flexi leave not avail for ILP trainees.
query.Apply for leave: Need to get the approval from Tech and Biz Faculty. Once they approve, the Facilitation Team will check if the leave can be approved from HR. Upon confirmation , leave will be approved. Once the leave is approved , the associate needs to apply for leave in Ultimatix and submit the leave request form.
query.Emergency Leave: Personal Emergency leave (when you fall sick) and family emergency.
query.Nearest Hospital: TSE, Ojas, AJ & KIMS, CSI Mission Hospital.
query.Doctor Avail time at ILP center: PP - 1.00 PM to 2.00 PM and CLC - 2.00 PM to 3.00 PM.
query.Deduct money from salary: Company will provide Rs. 6000/yr as domisciliary expense for a single person . They deduct  Rs.900/month in 8 instalments, ( for parents and inlaws).For self , spouse and kids will be paid by the corporate money from our salary . Coverage amount: Rs 6000 /year for domiciliary expenses , Rs 2 Lakhs as sum insured for Hospitalization and 12 Lakhs as a family floater (also for hospitalization) .
query.Raise a claim: To  raise a claim  goto Ultimatix->Global ESS-> Health and Wellness->TCS Health insurance portal.
query.Reimbursement Time: For  reimbursement,it will take 6 to 7 working days after the completion of settlement process .
query.Adding family members to HIS scheme: For TCS, the health and wellbeing of all employees and their family is paramount.  Hence, TCS provides them with easy access to best-in-class medical facilities through a comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme.  Family in this context implies spouse, children, parents and parents-in-law only.
query.Documents required: All the Original bills have to be submitted along with the claim form .  All the  bills&documents should be submitted within 90 days of Discharge .
query.Release Formalities: One must complete all the mandatory trainings and feedback. If there is no access to the Mandatory trainings, Required to raise a ticket in Ultimatix (under Global help desk) to fix the issue.
query.add beneficiaries: Link for adding new beneficiaries: Ultimatix ->Global ESS->Health & Insurance .   Follow this link for more details : Ultimatix -> Learning & Collaboration->KNOWMAX ->My HR->India->Health Safety & Wellness->Health & Insurance .
query.Baselocation Change: Associates are mapped to business needs and promises given to our clients cannot not changed due to our TCS values.
query.Stream Change: It will be difficult as you have already completed the the tech lounge.
query.Rules: Taking photos is not allowed in office ( only in front of Gym).
query.LAP duration: Associates will start with BizSkill LAP first, then will continue with PD if the trainee clears the Biz.Else will go for HR action. LAP Duration : CS LAP – 10 days, PD LAP– 10 days, Biz Skill LAP– 20 days.
query.Leave during LAP: Associate are not able to take  leave during LAP .
query.Emergency leave during LAP: Can take Emergency leave during LAP, but LAP date will be extended.
